body:
Comment 1: 
Despite that comment in the man page, Linux kernels are not going to remove the wait4
system call, as it would break many existing programs.  There is no way to replace wait4
with a non-NULL rusage parameter with waitpid.  The waitid system call takes an rusage
parameter, but is only available since 2.6.9, so it is too early to switch.  And since
wait4 will never actually go away, there is no reason to switch.
_Status changed to **WontFix**._
